name: Badge of Prophet Kuria
description:
The Badge of Prophet Kuria is given to those who show dedication and loyalty to the Amarr Empire. In recent years it has been given to capsuleers who assist the Empire in tasks of great importance.

“Though dissuaded, I came. Though perilous, I served. Though beset, I persevered. Though denied, I believed.” - The Scriptures, Prophet Kuria 12:18
